text: András Schiff (born 21 December 1953) is a Hungarian-born British classical pianist and conductor who has won a number of major awards. Since 2011, he has publicly stated criticism of Hungarian government policies. ==Other websites== *Andras Schiff: Beethoven Lecture-recitals at Wigmore Hall, London *National Public Radio Article *In Concert on National Public Radio Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian pianists Category:Classical pianists Category:Musicians from Budapest Category:British classical musicians
title: András Schiff
